properties.name: brook.lock.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable flow-lock, the default is 'false'.

properties.name: brook.lock.lock-lease-time
properties.description: The maximum lock occupancy time. When the time is reached, the lock will be automatically released. The default is 60000 millis.

properties.name: brook.lock.lock-time-to-try
properties.description: Maximum lock acquisition time. After the time is reached, the wait ends even if the lock is not acquired. The default value is 500 milliseconds.

properties.name: brook.log.root
properties.description: After the flow turns on log output, the storage path of the log. The default is '$USER_DIR/logs'.

properties.name: brook.log.suffix
properties.description: The log file suffix, default value is '.log'.
